name: lute
tagline: A self-hosted personal search engine for private content
description: Lute is a minimalist, privacy-focused personal search engine that indexes content from your browser or text files. Itâ€™s self-hosted and offers fast full-text search across documents, links, and notes.

features.title: Search and Filter
features.description: Index browser content, Search documents, Find links. Your own private search engine

features.title: Self-Hosted
features.description: Self-hosted, No tracking, Local storage. Your searches stay completely private

features.title: Minimal Interface
features.description: Clean design, Fast performance, Simple to use. Focused search experience

features.title: Data Import
features.description: Import bookmarks, Index history, Sync content. Connect with your browser

features.title: Lightweight
features.description: Low resource usage, Fast indexing, Efficient storage. Minimal system requirements
